verses.verse: Now the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H1961>came<s%> to <S%H3058>Jehu<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H2607>Hanani<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> <S%H1201>Baasha,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

<S%H3282>"Inasmuch<s%> <S%H834><s%> as I <S%H7311>exalted<s%> you from the <S%H6083>dust<s%> and <S%H5414>made<s%> you <S%H5057>leader<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> My <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> and you have <S%H1980>walked<s%> in the <S%H1870>way<s%> of <S%H3379>Jeroboam<s%> and have made My <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H2398>sin,<s%> <S%H3707>provoking<s%> Me to <S%H3707>anger<s%> with their <S%H9128>sins,<s%>

<S%H2009>behold,<s%> I will <S%H1197>consume<s%> <S%H1201>Baasha<s%> and his <S%H1004>house,<s%> and I will <S%H5414>make<s%> your <S%H1004>house<s%> like the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3379>Jeroboam<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5028>Nebat.<s%>

"Anyone of <S%H1201>Baasha<s%> who <S%H4191>dies<s%> in the <S%H5892>city<s%> the <S%H3611>dogs<s%> shall <S%H398>eat,<s%> and anyone of his who <S%H4191>dies<s%> in the <S%H7704>field<s%> the <S%H5775>birds<s%> of the <S%H8064>heavens<s%> will <S%H398>eat.<s%>"

Now the <S%H3499>rest<s%> of the <S%H1697>acts<s%> of <S%H1201>Baasha<s%> and <S%H834>what<s%> he <S%H6213>did<s%> and his <S%H1369>might,<s%> are they not <S%H3789>written<s%> in the <S%H5612>Book<s%> of the <S%H1697>Chronicles<s%> <S%H3117><s%> of the <S%H4428>Kings<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>?

And <S%H1201>Baasha<s%> <S%H7901>slept<s%> with his fathers and was <S%H1>buried<s%> in <S%H6912>Tirzah,<s%> and <S%H8656>Elah<s%> his <S%H425>son<s%> <S%H1121>became<s%> <S%H4427>king<s%> in his <S%H4427>place.<s%>

<S%H1571>Moreover,<s%> the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H3027>through<s%> the <S%H5030>prophet<s%> <S%H3058>Jehu<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H2607>Hanani<s%> <S%H1571>also<s%> <S%H1961>came<s%> <S%H413>against<s%> <S%H1201>Baasha<s%> and his <S%H1004>household,<s%> both <S%H5921>because<s%> of <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H9567>evil<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> he <S%H6213>did<s%> in the <S%H5869>sight<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> <S%H3707>provoking<s%> Him to <S%H3707>anger<s%> with the <S%H4639>work<s%> of his <S%H3027>hands,<s%> in <S%H1961>being<s%> like the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3379>Jeroboam,<s%> and <S%H5921>because<s%> <S%H834><s%> he <S%H5221>struck<s%> it.

In the twenty-sixth <S%H8141>year<s%> of <S%H609>Asa<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> <S%H425>Elah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H1201>Baasha<s%> <S%H4427>became<s%> <S%H4427>king<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%> at <S%H8656>Tirzah,<s%> [and reigned] two <S%H8141>years.<s%>

And his <S%H5650>servant<s%> <S%H2174>Zimri,<s%> <S%H8269>commander<s%> of <S%H4276>half<s%> his <S%H7393>chariots,<s%> <S%H7194>conspired<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> him. Now he [was] at <S%H8656>Tirzah<s%> <S%H8354>drinking<s%> himself <S%H7910>drunk<s%> in the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H777>Arza,<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> [was] <S%H5921>over<s%> the <S%H1004>household<s%> at <S%H8656>Tirzah.<s%>

Then <S%H2174>Zimri<s%> <S%H935>went<s%> in and <S%H5221>struck<s%> him and <S%H4191>put<s%> him to <S%H4191>death,<s%> in the twenty-seventh <S%H8141>year<s%> of <S%H609>Asa<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> and <S%H4427>became<s%> <S%H4427>king<s%> in his <S%H8478>place.<s%>

And it <S%H1961>came<s%> about, when he <S%H4427>became<s%> <S%H4427>king,<s%> as soon as he <S%H3427>sat<s%> on his <S%H3678>throne,<s%> that he <S%H5221>killed<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1004>household<s%> of <S%H1201>Baasha;<s%> he did not <S%H7604>leave<s%> a single <S%H8366>male,<s%> <S%H7023><s%> neither of his <S%H1350>relatives<s%> nor of his <S%H7453>friends.<s%>

Thus <S%H2174>Zimri<s%> <S%H8045>destroyed<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1004>household<s%> of <S%H1201>Baasha,<s%> according to the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> He <S%H1696>spoke<s%> <S%H413>against<s%> <S%H1201>Baasha<s%> <S%H3027>through<s%> <S%H3058>Jehu<s%> the <S%H5030>prophet,<s%>

for <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H9128>sins<s%> of <S%H1201>Baasha<s%> and the <S%H9128>sins<s%> of <S%H425>Elah<s%> his <S%H1121>son,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> they <S%H2398>sinned<s%> and <S%H834>which<s%> they made <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H2398>sin,<s%> <S%H3707>provoking<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> to <S%H3707>anger<s%> with their <S%H1892>idols.<s%>

Now the <S%H3499>rest<s%> of the <S%H1697>acts<s%> of <S%H425>Elah<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> that he <S%H6213>did,<s%> are they not <S%H3789>written<s%> in the <S%H5612>Book<s%> of the <S%H1697>Chronicles<s%> <S%H3117><s%> of the <S%H4428>Kings<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>?

In the twenty-seventh <S%H8141>year<s%> of <S%H609>Asa<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> <S%H2174>Zimri<s%> <S%H4427>reigned<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%> at <S%H8656>Tirzah.<s%> Now the <S%H5971>people<s%> were <S%H2583>camped<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> <S%H1405>Gibbethon,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> belonged to the <S%H6430>Philistines.<s%>

And the <S%H5971>people<s%> who were <S%H2583>camped<s%> <S%H8085>heard<s%> it <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H2174>"Zimri<s%> has <S%H7194>conspired<s%> and has <S%H1571>also<s%> <S%H5221>struck<s%> <S%H5221>down<s%> the <S%H4428>king.<s%>" Therefore <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H4427>made<s%> <S%H6018>Omri,<s%> the <S%H8269>commander<s%> of the <S%H6635>army,<s%> <S%H4427>king<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%> that <S%H3117>day<s%> in the <S%H4264>camp.<s%>
Then <S%H6018>Omri<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%> with him <S%H5927>went<s%> up from <S%H1405>Gibbethon,<s%> and they <S%H6696>besieged<s%> <S%H5921><s%> <S%H8656>Tirzah.<s%>

And it <S%H1961>came<s%> about, when <S%H2174>Zimri<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> that the <S%H5892>city<s%> was <S%H3920>taken,<s%> that he <S%H935>went<s%> into the <S%H759>citadel<s%> of the king's <S%H1004>house<s%> and <S%H8313>burned<s%> the king's <S%H1004>house<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> him with <S%H784>fire,<s%> and <S%H4191>died,<s%>

<S%H5921>because<s%> of his <S%H9128>sins<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> he <S%H2398>sinned,<s%> <S%H6213>doing<s%> <S%H7451>evil<s%> in the <S%H5869>sight<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> <S%H1980>walking<s%> in the <S%H1870>way<s%> of <S%H3379>Jeroboam,<s%> and in his <S%H9128>sin<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> he <S%H6213>did,<s%> making <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H2398>sin.<s%>

Now the <S%H3499>rest<s%> of the <S%H1697>acts<s%> of <S%H2174>Zimri<s%> and his <S%H7195>conspiracy<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> he <S%H7194>carried<s%> out, are they not <S%H3789>written<s%> in the <S%H5612>Book<s%> of the <S%H1697>Chronicles<s%> <S%H3117><s%> of the <S%H4428>Kings<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>?

<S%H227>Then<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> were <S%H2505>divided<s%> into <S%H2677>two<s%> <S%H2677>parts:<s%> <S%H2677>half<s%> of the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H1961>followed<s%> <S%H310><s%> <S%H8402>Tibni<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H1527>Ginath,<s%> to <S%H4427>make<s%> him <S%H4427>king;<s%> the [other] <S%H2677>half<s%> <S%H310>followed<s%> <S%H6018>Omri.<s%>

But the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> <S%H310>followed<s%> <S%H6018>Omri<s%> <S%H2388>prevailed<s%> <S%H2388>over<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> <S%H310>followed<s%> <S%H8402>Tibni<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H1527>Ginath.<s%> And <S%H8402>Tibni<s%> <S%H4191>died<s%> and <S%H6018>Omri<s%> <S%H4427>became<s%> <S%H4427>king.<s%>

In the thirty-first <S%H8141>year<s%> of <S%H609>Asa<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> <S%H6018>Omri<s%> <S%H4427>became<s%> <S%H4427>king<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> [and <S%H4427>reigned<s%>] <S%H8147>twelve<s%> <S%H6240><s%> <S%H8141>years;<s%> he reigned <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> at <S%H8656>Tirzah.<s%>

And he <S%H7069>bought<s%> the <S%H2022>hill<s%> <S%H8111>Samaria<s%> from <S%H8106>Shemer<s%> for two <S%H3603>talents<s%> of <S%H3701>silver;<s%> and he <S%H1129>built<s%> on the <S%H2022>hill,<s%> and <S%H7121>named<s%> <S%H8034><s%> the <S%H5892>city<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> he <S%H1129>built<s%> <S%H8111>Samaria,<s%> <S%H5921>after<s%> the <S%H8034>name<s%> of <S%H8106>Shemer,<s%> the <S%H113>owner<s%> of the <S%H2022>hill.<s%>

And <S%H6018>Omri<s%> <S%H6213>did<s%> <S%H7451>evil<s%> in the <S%H5869>sight<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> and <S%H7489>acted<s%> <S%H4480>more<s%> <S%H7489>wickedly<s%> <S%H4480>than<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> [were] <S%H6440>before<s%> him.

For he <S%H1980>walked<s%> in <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1870>way<s%> of <S%H3379>Jeroboam<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5028>Nebat<s%> and in his <S%H9128>sins<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> he made <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H2398>sin,<s%> <S%H3707>provoking<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> with their <S%H1892>idols.<s%>

Now the <S%H3499>rest<s%> of the <S%H1697>acts<s%> of <S%H6018>Omri<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> he <S%H6213>did<s%> and his <S%H1369>might<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> he <S%H6213>showed,<s%> are they not <S%H3789>written<s%> in the <S%H5612>Book<s%> of the <S%H1697>Chronicles<s%> <S%H3117><s%> of the <S%H4428>Kings<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>?

So <S%H6018>Omri<s%> <S%H7901>slept<s%> with his fathers, and was <S%H1>buried<s%> in <S%H6912>Samaria;<s%> and <S%H8111>Ahab<s%> his <S%H256>son<s%> <S%H1121>became<s%> <S%H4427>king<s%> in his <S%H4427>place.<s%>

Now <S%H256>Ahab<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H6018>Omri<s%> <S%H4427>became<s%> <S%H4427>king<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%> in the thirty-eighth <S%H8141>year<s%> of <S%H609>Asa<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> and <S%H256>Ahab<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H6018>Omri<s%> <S%H4427>reigned<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%> in <S%H8111>Samaria<s%> twenty-two <S%H8141>years.<s%>

And <S%H256>Ahab<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H6018>Omri<s%> <S%H6213>did<s%> <S%H7451>evil<s%> in the <S%H5869>sight<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H4480>more<s%> <S%H4480>than<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> were <S%H6440>before<s%> him.

And it <S%H1961>came<s%> about, as though it had been a <S%H7043>trivial<s%> <S%H7043>thing<s%> for him to <S%H1980>walk<s%> in the <S%H9128>sins<s%> of <S%H3379>Jeroboam<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5028>Nebat,<s%> that he <S%H3947>married<s%> <S%H802><s%> <S%H348>Jezebel<s%> the <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of <S%H856>Ethbaal<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of the <S%H6722>Sidonians,<s%> and <S%H1980>went<s%> to <S%H5647>serve<s%> <S%H1168>Baal<s%> and <S%H7812>worshiped<s%> him.
So he <S%H6965>erected<s%> an <S%H4196>altar<s%> for <S%H1168>Baal<s%> in the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H1168>Baal,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> he <S%H1129>built<s%> in <S%H8111>Samaria.<s%>

And <S%H256>Ahab<s%> also <S%H6213>made<s%> the <S%H842>Asherah.<s%> Thus <S%H256>Ahab<s%> <S%H6213>did<s%> <S%H3254>more<s%> to <S%H3707>provoke<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H4480>than<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H4428>kings<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> were <S%H6440>before<s%> him.

In his <S%H3117>days<s%> <S%H2419>Hiel<s%> the <S%H1017>Bethelite<s%> <S%H1129>built<s%> <S%H3405>Jericho;<s%> he <S%H3245>laid<s%> its <S%H3245>foundations<s%> with the [loss of] <S%H48>Abiram<s%> his first-born, and <S%H5324>set<s%> up its <S%H1817>gates<s%> with the [loss of] his <S%H6810>youngest<s%> son <S%H7687>Segub,<s%> according to the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> He <S%H1696>spoke<s%> by <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5126>Nun.<s%>
